task.title: Signing in to Sametime
task.shortdesc: You can join a Sametime meeting as an authenticated user or guest user. This topic describes the steps on how to sign in to your Sametime account in a web browser.

taskbody.prereq: You need your organization's unique meeting URL to connect to the Sametime server. The meeting URL is in the following format.https://meetings.customname.com/

context.p: As a pre-requisite, guests are required to Join as a guest and then enter their display name. Unlike authenticated users, guests have limited access to the meeting features.

Sign in to your account to create, start, or join a meeting. Your account credentials are the same whether you are using the Sametime embedded client or the standalone client. If your organization uses Single Sign-On (SSO), authenticate using the same credentials as other internal services.
To sign in to your account, follow these steps:

step.cmd: In a web browser, go to the meeting URL. For access assistance, contact the meeting moderator.

info.note: Microsoft Internet Explorer is not supported. For more information, refer to System Requirements.

step.cmd: On the login page, select Login.
Enter your username and password, and then select Login.
step.stepresult: After you have signed in to your account, the Meetings homepage is displayed. From the homepage, you can start, edit, and delete a defined meeting room. You can also access your personal room, start an instant meeting, or create a moderated meeting.
